column3: No. of cases Compounded or Withdrawn (Col.3)
column4: No. of cases in which trials were completed - Convicted (Col.4)
column5: No. of cases in which trials were completed - Acquitted or Discharged (Col.5)
column6: No. of cases in which trials were completed - Total (Col.6) = {(Col.5) + (Col.6)}
column7: No. of cases in which trials were completed - Pending Trial at the end of the year (Col.7)
